properties.entry: select repertory_id, repertory_name, repertory_class, repertory_num, repertory_desc, created_by, created_time, is_deleted from repertory where is_deleted = 0
select repertory_id, repertory_name, repertory_class, repertory_num, repertory_desc, created_by, created_time, is_deleted from repertory where is_deleted = 0 and repertory_name = ?
select repertory_id, repertory_name, repertory_class, repertory_num, repertory_desc, created_by, created_time, is_deleted from repertory where is_deleted = 0 and repertory_id = ?
select repertory_id, repertory_name, repertory_class, repertory_num, repertory_desc, created_by, created_time, is_deleted from repertory where is_deleted = 0 and repertory_class = ?
INSERT INTO repertory (repertory_id, repertory_name, repertory_class, repertory_num, repertory_desc, created_by, created_time, is_deleted) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?);
UPDATE repertory SET repertory_num = ? WHERE ID = ?
